column5: I have suicidal thoughts too.. All the time.  I think maybe we should both see a therapist?  Suicide just seems so.... permanent...

Happy Birthday and all the best to you.  

You've had a very hard life, but through all of it youre still here... Keep your head up and keep pushing on. 

As a birthday gift to yourself, maybe try joing some club or attending an event where people have similar interests.
